committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning

official_title: To establish a commission to study the establishment of a national education museum and archive for the United States.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Education to appoint a national commission, including representatives from both the public and private sectors, to study the development, creation, and operation of a national education museum and archive.

titles.title: To establish a commission to study the establishment of a national education museum and archive for the United States.
